articles.title: Worms Caught Creating Superorganisms in the Wild for the First Time - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: Scientists capture tiny worms creating towering "superorganisms" in the wild.
articles.content: In a groundbreaking discovery, scientists have observed tiny nematode worms forming “superorganisms” by creating towering structures in the wild, a behavior previously only observed under experimenta… [+4333 chars]
